Telepathy (O4): (2) Allows self to communicate telepathically using a shared language with any creature in a 30' radius for 10 min (heightened 6th allows communication with creatures without a shared language)
Teleport (A6): (10 min) Transports self and 4 willing touched creatures or objects up to 100 miles to a point near a specified known location (heightened 7th transports 1000 miles; 8th transports anywhere on the same planet; 9th transports to any planet in the same system; 10th transports to any planet in the same galaxy)
Teleport (O6): (10 min) Transports self and 4 willing touched creatures or objects up to 100 miles to a point near a specified known location (heightened 7th transports 1000 miles; 8th transports anywhere on the same planet; 9th transports to any planet in the same system; 10th transports to any planet in the same galaxy)
Tentacular Limbs (O1 Foc): (1) Extends reach for touch spells and unarmed Strikes to 10' for 1 min; adding an action to touch spells extends reach to 20' (heightened +2 adding an action gives +10' touch spell reach)
Thoughtful Gift (A1): (1) R120' Teleports a light Bulk object from self to a willing target (heightened 3rd extends the range to 500'; 5th teleports a Bulk 1 item, and using 3 actions extends the range to 1 mile)

Zealous Conviction (D6): (2) R30' 10 willing targets gain 12 temporary Hit Points, gain +2 Will vs. mental effects, and must comply with self requests for 10 min (save Will each rd while fulfilling a repugnant request ends the spell) (heightened 9th gives 18 temporary Hit Points and +3 Will)
Zealous Conviction (O6): (2) R30' 10 willing targets gain 12 temporary Hit Points, gain +2 Will vs. mental effects, and must comply with self requests for 10 min (save Will each rd while fulfilling a repugnant request ends the spell) (heightened 9th gives 18 temporary Hit Points and +3 Will)
Magic Notes:
Aberrant Bloodline: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows the Tentacular Limbs occult spell
Bard Dedication: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows 2 occult cantrips
Bloodline Spells: Has a focus pool
Cleric Dedication: Spell Trained (Divine)/Can prepare 2 divine cantrips each day
Druid Dedication: Spell Trained (Primal)/Can prepare 2 primal cantrips each day
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Occult)
Wizard Dedication: Spell Trained (Arcane)/Can prepare 2 arcane cantrips each day
Aberrant Bloodline: Blood magic effect gives self +2 or a target -1 Will saves for 1 rd
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Bloodline Spells: Casting a bloodline or sorcerous gift spell invokes a blood magic effect
Cleric Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Curriculum Spells: Automatically adds school-specified spells to spellbook
Druid Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the primal tradition
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-rank Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-rank during Seek
Occult Evolution: Can spend 1 min to add an unknown mental occult spell to repertoire until next daily prep once per day
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Sorcerer Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Sorcerous Potency: Initial damage or healing from spell slots inflicts or restores additional HP equal to the spell's rank
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area instantaneous spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone instantaneous spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone instantaneous spell by 10'
Wizard Dedication: Owns a spellbook with 4 arcane cantrips
Wizard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
Notes
Validation Errors: Cleric Sanctification Allocation: 0 available vs. 1 allocated
